actionTemplate.title: Oil-control base routine
steps: Mist setting spray lightly as a prep layer
Apply oil-control primer; color-correct here to use less foundation
Apply thin even foundation; then touch up with liquid concealer
Press loose powder in thin layers; finish with spray to reduce powdery look

rationaleTemplate: Less product buildup helps reduce creasing and breakup
Layering spray and powder improves wear on oily areas
